Room.Name: Jerome's Blue Training Room
Room.ShortDescription: This is the training room for advanced fighters.
Room.LongDescription: In order to get the key to the advanvement room you must defeat Karl, the second son of Jerome. Of course, it will do you no good if don't have the funds to pay for your training. Karl is big and experienced, but he's a sucker for an overhand rabbit punch. Go for it!
